Would it be able to play on a playstation 3 ? :)

Through a media server like PS3 Media Server or TVersity yes, but to put on the PS3 and save, no because it doesn't support mkv type files.

Perhaps you can mod your PS3 to play different codecs, but it will cost you your access to the PSN.
